title: WAF Alert Triage
description: A SOC analyst receives an alert from the Web Application Firewall (WAF) for a cross-site scripting (XSS) attempt.

tasks.description: Review the WAF alert details, including the source IP and the malicious payload.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly retrieves the alert data.

tasks.description: Confirm that the WAF successfully blocked the malicious request and the XSS payload was not processed by the server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst verifies that the security control worked as intended.

tasks.description: Check the reputation of the source IP and, finding it is a known malicious actor, add it to a temporary blocklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst takes a proactive step to block the attacker from making further attempts.
